sentences.sContent: There are fears that the series could rekindle animosity between the two countries.
sentences.sCn: 有人担心这一系列的事情可能会重新引发两国之间的敌意。

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + kindle(点燃) → 重新点燃

trans.tranOther: If something rekindles an unpleasant situation, it makes the unpleasant situation happen again
